sentences.en: Dante: Wish you would have told me that in the first place, ya big mouthed moron!
sentences.cn: 但丁: 你应该一早就告诉我这些, 你个大嘴巴的笨蛋!

sentences.en: Don’t leave it there, you moron!
sentences.cn: 别把它放在那儿，你这个笨蛋！

sentences.en: I used to think that Gordon was a moron.
sentences.cn: 我曾以为戈登是个白痴。

sentences.en: Joe should be put in jail for calling me a moron.
sentences.cn: 提姆:阿乔该被关进牢里,他居然骂我是白痴.

sentences.en: Live like a moron, Live like a moron.
sentences.cn: 像傻瓜一样活着, 像傻瓜一样活着.

sentences.en: Matthew: I think this kangaroo court is a terrible idea, you moron.
sentences.cn: 马修: 我觉得这个私设法庭的主意很烂, 你这个白痴.

sentences.en: Moron! - I thought you were needy.
sentences.cn: 弱智! - 我以为你在乞讨.

sentences.en: Too bad the moron you hired shot her in the leg.
sentences.cn: 瞧你雇的那笨蛋,只打中了她的腿.

sentences.en: Wait in line Like the rest of us, you bleeping Moron!
sentences.cn: 像我们大家“一样”排队去, 你这个该死的白痴!

sentences.en: Well sir, so you actually think you're a moron?'the professor asked.
sentences.cn: 教授问啦“那么,你是真的认为你很愚蠢 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Where a moron can beat a wise man frequently? ONLINE poker room.
sentences.cn: 在什么地方傻瓜老是能打败聪明人? 网上扑克赌场.

sentences.en: You got something on your shirt . What's on your shirt? Moron!
sentences.cn: 你衬衣里有些东西. 那是什么? 蠢蛋!

sentences.en: You suck air through your mouth, you moron.
sentences.cn: 你是用嘴巴吸气的, 你这个白痴!

sentences.en: You've put salt in my tea, you moron.
sentences.cn: 你把盐放到我的茶里面了, 你这个低能儿.

trans.tran_cn: <口>傻子，痴愚者（指心理年龄在8至12岁的成年人）
trans.tran_en: someone whose intelligence has not developed to the normal level
